entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
